name: Horn of Olifant
text:
Activate 1 of these effects:
● Banish 1 Equip Spell from your field or GY, then you can destroy 1 card on the field.
● Destroy 1 "Roland" monster you control, then Special Summon up to 3 FIRE Warrior monsters from your Deck in Defense Position, whose total Levels equal 9, but negate their effects, also you cannot Special Summon monsters until the end of your next turn, except Warrior monsters.
You can only activate 1 "Horn of Olifant" per turn.
